item.title: Growth in Aviation industry
item.description: Good news, the industry is on a growth path in a big way. Let’s have a look at what markets are saying; The massive growth capabilities shown by the Aviation industry in last few years and revival after slow down demands trained professionals with specialized skills, the right attitude and adequate knowledge. With the revival of the aviation sector, the next 10 years could see a three-fold increase in demand for skilled personnel.

item.title: Career as a Cabin Crew
